text: Tum in ehle kitab ke paas khwa koi nishani le aao, mumkin nahin ke yeh tumhare qible ki pairwi karne lagein, aur na tumhare liye yeh mumkin hai ke inke qible ki pairwi karo, aur inmein se koi giroh bhi dusre ke qible ki pairwi ke liye tayyar nahin hai, aur agar tumne is ilm ke baad jo tumhare paas aa chuka hai inki khwahishaat ki pairwi ki to yaqeenan tumhara shumaar zalimon mein hoga
